verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> which came unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, when <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and all his <S%H2428>army<s%>, and all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> that were under his <S%H3027>dominion<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, were <S%H3898>fighting<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and against all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H559>thereof<s%>, saying:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H1980>Go<s%>, and <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, Thus saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I will give this <S%H5892>city<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and he shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire<s%>:

and thou shalt not escape <S%H4422>out<s%> of his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, but shalt <S%H8610>surely<s%> be <S%H8610>taken<s%>, and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> with thee <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

Yet <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, O <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> concerning <S%H4191>thee<s%>, Thou shalt not die by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>;

thou shalt <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>; and with the <S%H4955>burnings<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> that were <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8313>thee<s%>, so shall they make a burning for <S%H5594>thee<s%>; and they shall lament <S%H1945>thee<s%>, saying, Ah <S%H113>Lord<s%>! for I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> unto <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>,

when the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>'s <S%H2428>army<s%> was <S%H3898>fighting<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and against all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that were <S%H3498>left<s%>, against <S%H3923>Lachish<s%> and against <S%H5825>Azekah<s%>; for these alone <S%H7604>remained<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> as <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

The <S%H1697>word<s%> that came unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, to <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> liberty unto <S%H1865>them<s%>;

that every <S%H376>man<s%> should let his <S%H5650>man-servant<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H8198>maid-servant<s%>, that is a <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> or a <S%H5680>Hebrewess<s%>, <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%>; that none should make <S%H5647>bondmen<s%> of <S%H3064>them<s%>, to wit, of a Jew his <S%H251>brother<s%>.

And all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>obeyed<s%>, that had entered into the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, that every <S%H376>one<s%> should let his <S%H5650>man-servant<s%>, and every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H8198>maid-servant<s%>, <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%>, that none should make <S%H5647>bondmen<s%> of them any <S%H8085>more<s%>; they obeyed, and let them <S%H7971>go<s%>:

but <S%H310>afterwards<s%> they <S%H7725>turned<s%>, and caused the <S%H5650>servants<s%> and the <S%H8198>handmaids<s%>, whom they had let <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%>, to <S%H7725>return<s%>, and brought them into <S%H3533>subjection<s%> for <S%H5650>servants<s%> and for <S%H8198>handmaids<s%>.
Therefore the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: I <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> ye shall let <S%H7971>go<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> that is a <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%>, that hath been <S%H4376>sold<s%> unto <S%H5647>thee<s%>, and hath served thee <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, thou shalt let him <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> from <S%H1>thee<s%>: but your fathers <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto <S%H5186>me<s%>, neither inclined their <S%H241>ear<s%>.

And ye were <S%H3117>now<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%>, and had <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, in <S%H7121>proclaiming<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>; and ye had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in the <S%H1004>house<s%> which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>:

but ye <S%H7725>turned<s%> and <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%>, and caused every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>, whom ye had <S%H7971>let<s%> go <S%H2670>free<s%> at their <S%H5315>pleasure<s%>, to <S%H7725>return<s%>; and ye brought them into <S%H3533>subjection<s%>, to be unto you for <S%H5650>servants<s%> and for <S%H8198>handmaids<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: ye have not <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto <S%H7121>me<s%>, to proclaim <S%H1865>liberty<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H251>brother<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>: <S%H7121>behold<s%>, I proclaim unto you a <S%H1865>liberty<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, to the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, and to the <S%H7458>famine<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you to be <S%H2189>tossed<s%> to and fro among all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> that have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, that have not <S%H6965>performed<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which they <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3772>me<s%>, when they cut the <S%H5695>calf<s%> in <S%H8147>twain<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> between the parts <S%H1335>thereof<s%>;

the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, that <S%H5674>passed<s%> between the <S%H1335>parts<s%> of the <S%H5695>calf<s%>;

I will even <S%H5414>give<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life<s%>; and their dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> shall be for <S%H3978>food<s%> unto the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and to the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>'s <S%H2428>army<s%>, that are gone away from <S%H5927>you<s%>.

Behold <S%H6680><s%>, I will command, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and cause them to <S%H7725>return<s%> to this <S%H5892>city<s%>; and they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3920>it<s%>, and take <S%H8313>it<s%>, and burn it with <S%H784>fire<s%>: and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%>, without <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>.
